metadata.title: Super Easy Apple Pulissery | With Coconut Yogurt | Kerala Vegetarian Recipe
metadata.description: Fresh-picked green apples turned into a delicious savoury dish. Kerala style Pulissery, a vegetarian side dish enjoyed with rice.

en: [00:00:26.000] hey everyone this is St and welcome to my channel I hope everybody's doing great
[00:00:30.000] I went apple picking in September and I picked different varieties of apples
[00:00:35.000] in fact I got a huge basket full of apples
[00:00:38.000] so I do have my apple picking video I'll post the link in the description below
[00:00:44.000] so after that I've been trying different dishes with the apples both sweet and savory dishes
[00:00:52.000] in this video I'm going to show you guys how to make a savory dish with green apples
[00:00:57.000] or Granny Smith apples so green apples are not that sweet it has a tart taste
[00:01:04.000] it's going to be apple pulissery apples cooked with ground coconut and yogurt
[00:01:09.000] so it's a Kerala specialty vegetarian dish
[00:01:15.000] so guys let's get started here is the apple orchard
[00:01:20.000] I'm going to pick some green apples
[00:01:34.000] here are the green apples that I picked
[00:01:39.000] remove the core and seeds not going to peel off the skin
[00:02:02.000] so let's dice these up
[00:02:04.000] add the diced apples to a saucepan over medium heat
[00:02:10.000] add chili powder turmeric powder salt and water
[00:02:25.000] cook covered for five minutes till the apples turn soft
[00:02:37.000] add grated coconut cumin seeds green chilies and curry leaves to a blender

[00:03:00.000] add the ground coconut to the cooked apples
[00:03:15.000] cook for five minutes till the raw smell goes away

[00:03:40.000] lower the heat and add yogurt to the apples
[00:03:46.000] cook for one minute and remove from heat
[00:03:56.000] make the tempering heat coconut oil
[00:04:06.000] add mustard seeds dried red chilies and curry leaves
[00:04:18.000] pour the tempering over the apple pulissery
[00:04:36.000] serve with rice or chapatis
[00:05:00.000] here is the delicious apple pulissery
[00:05:10.000] do give this recipe a try and let me know your feedback
